Public Class KeysConverter Inherits TypeConverter Implements IComparer
public ref class KeysConverter : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter, System::Collections::IComparer

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他表示形式之间相互转换的 。

span.span: Provides a to convert objects to and from other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，类型转换器用于将转换实例与及其相应的本地化表示形式。Most commonly, the type converter is used to convert instances to and from their corresponding localized representations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类转换到。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to convert a to a . 此示例假定你有名为`TextBox1`上名为`Form1`。This example assumes that you have a named `TextBox1` on a named `Form1`. [!code-csharp[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是默认的、 为编译器提供构造函数类。This is the default, compiler-supplied constructor for the class. 通常情况下，你并不直接创建的实例。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a . 而应调用方法类。Instead, call the method of class. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法专用于返回`true`如果`sourceType`形参属于类型或数组; 否则，它将遵从基实现此方法的评估。The method is specialized to return `true` if the `sourceType` parameter is of type or array; otherwise, it defers evaluation to the base implementation of this method.

summary.span: 如果提供格式上下文，则返回适用于此类型转换器的数据类型的标准值集合。

summary.span: 确定从 返回的标准值列表是否是使用指定的 的独占列表。

span.span: Determines if the list of standard values returned from is an exclusive list using the specified .

returns.span: 如果从 返回的集合是可能值的穷举列表，则为 ；如果还可能有其他值，则为 。

returns.span: 此方法的默认实现总是返回 。

span.span: The default implementation for this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context`此方法的标准实现中未使用参数。The `context` parameter is not used in the standard implementation of this method. 如果该列表是独占的则任何其他值不都无效，如在数据类型。If the list is exclusive, then no other values are valid, such as in an data type. 如果该列表不是独占的则说明有的标准值列表之外的其他有效值提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values provides.
